general.gigTitle: design, redesign or develop your business website or blog

sellerCard.description:
Hi,
I have over 8+ years of experience in wordpress development. I create custom wordpress websites for all business. I have done more than 1700+ web projects at fiverr. I provide best customer support and unlimited revisions till you are 100% satisfied with the final result. I love to work with clients from all over the world. Yes! I am ready to serve you on Fiverr.

Let's Bring your Ideas to LIFE.

description.content:
Hello, I'm Rumi, a Senior Website Designer and Developer. My approach centers around understanding and visualizing your unique ideas and requirements through effective communication. Let's bring your vision to life together!


How It Works:

ï»¿

  1. Discussion: We'll talk about your project, leading to a detailed Scope of the Project, including all pages, features, and hosting specifics.
  2. Design Concept: I'll present an initial website design draft for your feedback. (Note: It's best to provide content at the start of the order. If unavailable, I'll use placeholder text for you to update later.)
  3. Revisions: Feel free to request changes to the website as needed.
  4. Final Review: After incorporating your changes, I'll deliver the project for your final review and feedback.


What I Provide:


  • Professional and Eye-Catching Website Design
  • Fully Responsive Designs
  • Royalty-Free Images
  • Social Media Integration
  • Instructional Video Post-Order Completion (if needed)


Why Choose Me:


  • Unlimited Revisions
  • Free Post-Completion Support


Order today to start your journey to an exceptional online presence!

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information do you need to begin working on my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
1. Website's Purpose
2. Target Audience
3. Content for the Website
4. Design and Branding Preferences
5. Functional Requirement

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer hosting or domain name registration services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I do not offer hosting or domain name registration. It's advisable to acquire these services under your own name for complete control over your website. For reliable WordPress hosting, I recommend Siteground and BlueHost, with their basic packages generally sufficing.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How does the project workflow proceed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The process begins with gathering your specific requirements and understanding the objectives of your business website. An initial draft will be provided to ensure our visions are aligned. Additionally, we can arrange a Zoom session for further discussion and exchange of ideas and suggestions.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is coding knowledge required to manage a WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No coding skills are necessary. WordPress operates on a user-friendly, drag-and-drop system. I will also supply you with easy-to-follow guides to help you manage and update your website independently.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What happens if the final website doesn't meet my expectations?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Throughout the project, I'll provide regular updates to ensure alignment with your vision. However, if the final delivery doesn't fully satisfy you, rest assured, I offer unlimited revisions. I'm committed to revising and refining the website until it meets your complete satisfaction! :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is Elementor PRO?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Elementor Pro is an advanced WordPress plugin featuring a drag-and-drop editor for effortless website design. It allows you to create and customize your site's layout visually without any coding knowledge, thanks to its intuitive and user-friendly interface.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How does Elementor PRO renewal work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: With me, you'll get the first year of Elementor Pro for free, a service that typically costs $59/year. For subsequent years, the renewal fee through my service is just $25 per year.

packageList.title: Basic Website Package
packageList.description: 1-3 Pages Basic Wordpress Website. Social Icons+ Slider+ Contact form + Admin Panel

customExtras.label: Elementor Licenses
